mapper.update: UPDATE t_goods SET saleflag='待发货' WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE t_goods SET del = '1' WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, mingcheng, tupian, tuijian FROM t_leibie WHERE del='0'
SELECT id,leibie_id AS leibieId,name FROM t_leibie_xiashu WHERE del='0' AND leibie_id=#{id}
SELECT sum(tc.num*tg.jiage) FROM t_car tc JOIN t_goods tg ON tc.goods_id = tg.id WHERE tc.huiyuan_id=#{id} and tc.del='0'

SELECT tg.id, (SELECT th.user_name FROM t_huiyuan th WHERE th.id=tg.fbid) AS fbid, tg.mingcheng, (SELECT tl.mingcheng FROM t_leibie tl WHERE tl.id =tg.leibieId) AS leibieName, (SELECT tlx.name FROM t_leibie_xiashu tlx WHERE tlx.id=tg.leibiexiashuId) AS leibiexiashuId, tg.jiage, tg.saleflag, tg.yuanjia, tg.fkfs
FROM t_goods tg where del= '0'
SELECT jieshao AS message FROM t_goods WHERE id=#{id}
